verses.1:
Tompo ô! nozarainao ny tena sy rànao (in-2)
Mandroso ho aminao 'zahay feno fiderana
F'Andriamanitra mahatoky Hianao
Anio, mandrakizay, derainay ny Anaranao
verses.2:
Nampiraisinao 'zahay mba hiray Aminao (in-2)
Ho tena mpirahalahy feno fitiavana
F'Andriamanitra mahatoky Hianao
Anio, mandrakizay, derainay ny Anaranao
verses.3:
Ny fitiavanao no tena nanafaka anay (in-2)
Ahafahanay mandroso ho tena masina tokoa
F'Andriamanitra mahatoky Hianao
Anio, mandrakizay, derainay ny Anaranao
verses.4:
Nomenao sori-dalana mba ho eo Aminao
Hitaona ireo namana hanaiky handray Anao
F'Andriamanitra mahatoky Hianao
Anio, mandrakizay, derainay ny Anaranao
